channel.title: Graduate Life on juppytt's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Graduate Life on juppytt's blog

item.title: Series: Graduate School Productivity - Introduction
item.description: Time flies in graduate school! Having spent 3.5 years as a PhD student, one thing I’ve learned is that I should be super-efficient in managing my time and energy. I’m not someone you’d label as “born productive”. I’m a typical “P”-type person according to Myers-Briggs Type Indicator (MBTI) – indicative of a spontaneous and flexible nature. As many P-type people do, I’m prone to distraction and have difficulty in sticking to routines.
